toolbar.importFromFile: Import from file (txt, md, docx, csv, html...)

chat.title: AI Assistant
chat.authorNotesPlaceholder: Enter a prompt to tell AI what content you want to generate...
chat.configureApiKeyMsg:
Please configure your API Key first to use AI generation.

Click the "Settings" button at the bottom of the chat panel, then configure your API Key in the AI tab.
chat.generating:
Generating content...

(Streaming in progress, content will appear gradually)
chat.generationComplete:
Content generated based on your prompt.

The generated content has been automatically updated in the editor's AI content panel.
chat.networkError:
Network connection failed: {{error}}

Please check your network connection or try again later.
chat.apiKeyError:
API Key is invalid or not configured.

Click the "Settings" button at the bottom of the chat panel, then configure your API Key in the AI tab.
chat.rateLimitError: API rate limit exceeded. Please try again later.
chat.promptPlaceholder:
Enter a prompt to tell AI how to expand or improve your content...

Examples:
- Please expand this prose into a more detailed description
- Maintain the original literary style, add more details
- Reorganize paragraph structure for better logic
chat.webSearchUnsupported: Current model does not support web search
chat.toolsHint: When enabled, AI can use built-in tools (search documents, etc.)
chat.toolsUnsupported: Current model does not support tool calls
chat.generateHint: Generate content based on prompt, auto-update to AI content panel
chat.startChat: Start a conversation with AI assistant
chat.configureApiFirst: Please configure API service in settings first

settings.title: Settings

languageSettings.title: Language Settings
languageSettings.restartRequired: It's recommended to restart the app after changing language for best experience

settings.templateManagementDesc: Manage document templates. Save current document as template via "File ‚Üí Save as Template", or create documents from templates via "File ‚Üí New from Template".
settings.templateUsageStep1: 1. After editing a document, click the template button in toolbar or menu "File ‚Üí Save as Template"
settings.templateUsageStep2: 2. Set template name, category, and choose content to retain
settings.templateUsageStep3: 3. When creating a new document, use "File ‚Üí New from Template" (‚åò‚áßT) to select a template
settings.fontApplyHint: Applied to editor and preview areas
settings.highlightActiveLineDesc: Highlight the line where the cursor is
settings.codeFoldingDesc: Show fold/unfold buttons next to line numbers
settings.highlightSelMatchesDesc: Highlight text matching the current selection
settings.autocompletionDesc: Show Markdown syntax suggestions while typing
settings.multiCursorDesc: Hold Alt and drag to create rectangular selections
settings.scrollPastEndDesc: Allow scrolling past the last line of the document
settings.indentOnInputDesc: Automatically adjust indentation when typing certain characters
settings.markdownLintDesc: Check heading levels, empty links, unclosed code blocks in real-time
settings.defaultViewModeDesc: Default display mode when opening documents
settings.toolbarButtonsDesc: Choose which button groups to show in the editor toolbar
settings.noAiServicesHint: Click "Create API Service" button above to add one
settings.streamingOutputDesc: AI replies will be displayed word by word when enabled
settings.enableThinkingDesc: When enabled, supported models will show reasoning/thinking process (Qwen/DeepSeek/Claude, etc.)
settings.forceMarkdownDesc: AI will always return content in clean Markdown format without unnecessary preamble
settings.systemPromptPlaceholder: Optional, leave empty to not add extra system prompt...
settings.pluginContentLimitDesc: Max characters of content sent to AI by plugins, 0 means no limit
settings.modelIdLabel: Model ID (actual API value, can be manually edited)
settings.noEmailAccountsHint: Click "Add Email Account" button above to add one
settings.emailProviderSupport: Supports NetEase 163, 126, China Mobile 139, QQ Mail, Gmail, Outlook, etc.
settings.emailUsageStep1: 1. SMTP server address and port will auto-fill after selecting a provider
settings.emailUsageStep2: 2. Most email services require enabling SMTP and obtaining an auth code (not login password)
settings.emailUsageStep3: 3. After configuration, click "Test Connection" to verify settings
settings.emailUsageStep4: 4. Configured accounts can be used directly in the email sending plugin
settings.smtpServerSettings: SMTP Server Settings (auto-filled after selecting provider, can be manually edited)

roleSettings.title: Role Settings
roleSettings.description: Select a professional role, and AI will automatically adapt to the role's expertise and writing style.
roleSettings.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this custom role?
roleSettings.promptNote: This prompt is automatically prepended to your custom System Prompt to establish the AI's professional identity.

pluginsSettings.description: Manage document processing plugins. Plugins can post-process document content, such as generating PPT, mind maps, etc.
pluginsSettings.title: Plugin Management
pluginsSettings.usageStep1: 1. Click the üß© plugin button in the editor toolbar
pluginsSettings.usageStep2: 2. Select a plugin from the dropdown menu
pluginsSettings.usageStep3: 3. The plugin panel will replace the editor area. Click "Back to Editor" to exit

settings.resetConfirm: Are you sure you want to reset all settings to default?
